description: Java class MacroSource implementing the SubstitutionSource interface, managing a hashmap of string key-value pairs for substitution, with methods to add mappings, retrieve variables, and check existence.

classes.name: MacroSource
classes.description: A class that provides hashmap-based string substitution by implementing the SubstitutionSource interface.

methods.name: addMapping
methods.description: Adds a key-value pair to the macro mapping.

methods.name: addMapping
methods.description: Adds all mappings from another MacroSource instance.

methods.name: getKeys
methods.description: Returns null, does not provide keys.

methods.name: getVariable
methods.description: Retrieves the value associated with a key from the mapping.

methods.name: hasObjectVariable
methods.description: Always returns false, indicating no object variables are stored.

methods.name: hasStringVariable
methods.description: Checks if the key exists in the mapping.
